definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: father of Haman (Pers. mâh, moon (mâha, month, Spieg:APK 236) + data, given? so (written hamaodata Öt; LXX (Amadaqou (alw. Genit.); in Gk. perh. Mada/thv [Mada/tav, Made/thv], cf. Xenoph:Cyr, v. 3. 41 Diod:xvii, 67 Pott:ZMG 1859, 424);—[[הַמְּדָתָא הָֽאֲגׇגִי]] Es 3:1, Es 3:10, Es 8:5, Es 9:24; without [[האגגי]] Es 9:10.
